headline: Ralph Lauren Viral Holiday Surge Reshapes 2026 Growth And Margin Story
summary: Ralph Lauren (NYSE:RL) experienced a viral jump in brand popularity during the 2025 holiday season, driven by its nostalgic aesthetic across social media. The surge in consumer engagement is credited with supporting revenue and net income across all major regions. Following this performance, Ralph Lauren revised its fiscal 2026 outlook, guiding to stronger revenue and higher operating margins, with particular strength in China and key global cities. For you as an investor, Ralph Lauren sits...
